definitions.text: metal or earthenware cooking vessel that is usually round and deep; often has a handle and lid
a plumbing fixture for defecation and urination
the quantity contained in a pot
a container in which plants are cultivated
(often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos

definitions.text: the cumulative amount involved in a game (such as poker)
a resistor with three terminals, the third being an adjustable center terminal; used to adjust voltages in radios and TV sets
